Question
========
How do you define an executable code chunk in a Quarto document?

Answerlist
----------
* Use triple backticks followed by a language identifier like `{r}`
* Use a single backtick and a colon
* Wrap the code in HTML `<code>` tags
* Put the code only in YAML front matter

Solution
========
Code chunks start with triple backticks and a language identifier, such as `{r}`.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
